personalInfo.name: Hafida Belayd
personalInfo.title: Data Scientist
personalInfo.summary: Data Scientist with a strong background in data science, specializing in turning raw data into meaningful insights that drive smart decisions. From building dashboards to running predictive models, I love exploring data to uncover patterns and trends that matter. Passionate about using AI and advanced analytics to solve real-world problems and create value for businesses and communities.

experience.description: Constructed algorithms using statistical methods to analyze large datasets and deliver business insights using Python and Power BI. Applied machine learning techniques for predictive modeling and business analysis.
Completed intensive software engineering training covering front-end, back-end, DevOps, and mobile development roles, with 70 hours/week commitment.
Performed data analysis and visualization using Power BI and Excel. Applied strategic thinking to draw insights from data.
Developed WordPress websites using HTML5, CSS3, JS, and PHP. Implemented SEO strategies and ensured cross-browser compatibility.
Contributed to B2B marketing strategy and brand awareness through visual content creation and social media materials.
Created multimedia content for branding and marketing initiatives, contributed to SEO and video production strategies.
Led a design team and increased online engagement by 15% through compelling visual content.
Created social media content, increasing engagement by 30%. Analyzed trends and adapted visuals accordingly.
Oversaw visual identity, branding, and digital campaigns using analytics and creative tools.

education.description: Comprehensive associate's program in Computer Science focusing on software development and computer systems. Maintained a GPA of 3.52 while gaining proficiency in web development and core CS fundamentals.

In-depth data science training focused on data visualization, Python programming, machine learning, and professional development. Emphasizes both technical and soft skills to prepare for real-world data roles and interviews.
Specialized program in Artificial Intelligence focused on foundational Python programming, NumPy, pandas, and building simple neural networks.
Formal training in graphic design and branding. Focused on creative software tools and visual communication principles.

projects.name: Educational_Tutor_AI_Assistant_Code_Walkthrough
projects.description: Educational Tutor AI Assistant using Google's Gemini language model. The assistant includes features like generating quizzes, creating flashcards, providing grammar corrections, and offering project guidance.

projects.name: Education-Trends-and-Disparities-A-Focus-on-Morocco
projects.description: Morocco's education system comprises various levels, including primary, secondary, and tertiary education. It is structured to provide universal access to education for its citizens.

projects.name: CodeTransEval
projects.description: Code Project Converter is a lightweight tool that translates code projects between different programming languages. It supports converting C projects to Python, Python to JavaScript, and Python to Java.

projects.name: Insights-into-Luxury-Fashion
projects.description: This project conducts a comprehensive analysis of a dataset containing product listings from SSENSE, a renowned retailer in designer fashion and high-end streetwear.
